author: Sarah Perez
title: TikTok to launch parental controls globally, disable direct messaging for users under 16
description: TikTok is introducing a new set of parental controls to its platform to users worldwide, including in the U.S. The features, collectively referred to as “Family Pairing,” will allow parents to set controls on Screen Time Management, Restricted Mode, and Direc…
